tasks.task: In src/main.py, modify the graph so that after a specialist node runs, the edge points back to the router_specialist node.
In src/prompts/router_specialist.prompt, add 'END' to the list of valid routing destinations and add a rule for when to use it.
In src/main.py, modify the conditional edge function to handle the new 'END' route from the router.

test: Run the application with a multi-step prompt, such as `python -m src.main "Read the README.md file and tell me what it says."`. The successful execution of the sequence (ROUTER -> FILE -> ROUTER -> PROMPT -> ROUTER -> END) will confirm the loop is working.
